alert.note: Alert for Northern Lake County; Osceola; Southern Lake County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 29 at 5:53AM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Locally Dense Fog Developing Across Portions Lake, Osceola, and Okeechobee Counties Early This Morning... As of 545 AM, satellite imagery and traffic cameras show locally dense fog expanding into Lake, Osceola, and Okeechobee Counties. Visibilities may be reduced to less then one mile in some locations, and could drop to a few hundred yards or less prior to sunrise. Motorists, especially those on major roadways such as the Florida Turnpike and State Roads 60 and 98, should prepare to encounter rapidly reductions in visibility from the fog. When driving in fog, reduce your speed, use only your low beam headlights, and leave extra distance between your vehicle and the one in front of you.

area.areaDesc: Northern Lake County; Osceola; Southern Lake County
